Esta confiante que vai pagar sem problemas, o seu sonho e concluir a sua casa para propor melhor conforto a sua familia, e iniciar um negocio, para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Ines is from the city of Maputo, which is located in province of the same name in southern Mozambique.  She is a single mother of 2 children who are 24 and 26.  She studied through the sixth grade and stopped because of the lack of financial resources.  She lives in her own home wiht her family and also supports her niece by sending her money.

She never left Maputo. She has been a full-time employee at the water management office, "ARA-SUL," for more than 15 years.  She makes 3,500 meticals a month that she puts towards her home's expenses, and she also saves some in her bank account.

She has never had a loan with another bank.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through friends who are also clients of the institution.  This is her third loan in the amount of 15,000 meticals.  She will use it to buy construction materials (sand, cement, metals sheets, etc.).  Her previous loans were for 10,000 and 12,000 meticals and went towards her home.

She is confident that she will pay back her loan without any problems.  Her dream is to finish her house to provide her family with better comfort and to start a business, for which she plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, metal sheets, etc.)

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. She is 61 years old, married and has one child.

Sajida is a tailor. She has made and repaired women’s clothing since 1995. She has good experience and her place is situated in a crowded area so there are a good number of customers passing by. She has a good reputation.

She is requesting a $2,400 loan to buy a sewing machine and to add more inventories like tissues. She is aiming to increase her income so she can improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine and add more inventory.

loans.name: Ya-Allaou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe YA-ALLAOU est formé de deux personnes qui habitent ensemble dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Yayabou Amacha, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Yayabou Amacha est âgée de 49 ans est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Razacki. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Il y a environs dix ans que Yayabou Amacha exerce comme activité, la vente de produits de quincaillerie à son domicile ; ce qui lui permet de répondre sans grande difficulté aux besoins de sa famille et de subvenir à ses besoins. Yayabou Amacha s’approvisionne au Nigeria et au Ghana, États voisins du Bénin. Dans le souci de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, Yayabou Amacha désire augmenter le stock de ses produits. Pour ce faire, Yayabou Amacha sollicite ensemble avec le second membre du groupe YA-ALLAOU, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
Group Ya-Allaou is composed of two people who live together in the same neighborhood. The group's representative, named Yayabou Amacha, is the woman raising her hand in the picture. This is the second time that this group is requesting ALIDé's financial support in order to increase their level of activity.
Yayabou Amacha is 49 years old and married to a woodworker named Razacki. The couple has three children, who all go to school and depend on them financially. For about ten years, Yayabou Amacha has been in the business of retailing hardware supplies from her home, which allows her to easily provide for her and her family's needs. Yayabou Amacha gets her supplies from Nigeria and Ghana, two states neighboring Benin.
With the objective to better meet her clients' needs, Yayabou Amacha wants to increase her stock of products. To do this, Yayabou Amacha is requesting a second loan from ALIDé, together with group Ya-Allaou's second member.

loans.use: to buy hardware supplies.

loans.name: Hamda

texts.en: Hamda is a 41-year-old married woman who is married to Nidal, a 44-year-old employee. Three years ago, they both opened a boutique in Marka and registered it under Hamda’s name. Since Nidal has a lot of experience in the market from his full time job, he helps her run the business from bringing goods to the store to selling them. This business is now a reliable income for their family. That’s why Hamda now wants to expand it by adding products to the boutique to be prepared for the upcoming religious celebration and holidays. Hamda is also looking forward to taking the shop next door as an expansion for her boutique. Hamda is a conservative person who preferred that her husband be in the picture instead of her.

loans.use: To add new models of clothes to her boutique

loans.name: Maher

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 26 years old, married and has one child.

Maher has owned an agency since 2003 for renting and selling cooking utensils.  He has a deep understanding of local consumer needs and he has a good reputation and he is well known in his area.

He is requesting a $3000 loan to enlarge his agency and to add more inventory. He is aiming to earn more profit so he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To enlarge his agency and to add more inventory.

loans.name: Mendkhuu

texts.en:
Mendkhuu, aged 49, and her husband, Erdenebileg, have been working hard to get ahead and support their family. 
She has been working as a pastry-cook at a local food manufacturing company for over seven years. Her husband is one of the operations staff at Nomin Holding Co.,Ltd. They live in a traditional Mongolian yurt “ger” in the outer district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

She is the mother of three adult children aged 24, 27 and 29. Her daughter, Uranjargal, stays with her parents and attends college, studying Business Financial Management. The youngest son is living and working in Korea while his brother lives separately with his family in Ulaanbaatar and runs a taxi business.

Mendkhuu is requesting a 3,500,000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) loan to invest in buying a small log house for her son. It is tough for her children living apart. As a mother, she is striving to make their lives better. She is very grateful to the institute and the lenders for giving her an opportunity to achieve her goal as well as to make a big change in her son's life.

loans.use: To invest in buying a small log house for her son

loans.name: Hikhmat

texts.ru:
Hikhmat ne jenat i ne imeyet detey. Yemu 25 let. On jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey mamoy. Yego mama bolna i on uxajivayet za ney i rabotayet chtobi oplatit yeyo lecheniye. Hikhmat uje 3 qoda kak rabotayet taxistom. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyego dyadi kotoriy i pomog yemu kupit  etu mashinu chtobi on mog zarabativat dlya lecheniya materi. 
Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit zapchasti dlya pochinki svoyey mashini i razvitiya svoyego biznessa.
texts.en: Hikhmat is not married and has no children.  He is 25 years old.  He lives in Baku with his mother.  His mother is ill, and he takes care of her and works to pay for her medical care.  Hikhmat has been working as a taxi driver for three years.  He started this business with his uncle who, in order to help pay for Hikhmat's mother's care, helped him buy the taxi.  Now he needs 2000 AZN to buy parts to repair his car and develop his business.

loans.use: to buy parts for his car.

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор проживает в Хамадонинском районе. Возраст 30 лет. Замужем, имеет 4 детей. У неё среднее образование. Более пяти лет Гулбахор занимается торговлей овощей на центральном рынке района. Кредит берет для покупки овощей. Она хочет расширить ассортиментов своего товара.
texts.en: Gulbahor lives in Hamadoni.  She is 30 years old, married, and has four children. She has a secondary education. For more than five years, Gulbahor has traded in vegetables in the region's central market. She is taking out a loan to buy vegetables. She wants to offer a greater variety of goods.

loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en:
Innocent is 25 years old and is single. His business is well-organized. He sells items like cassava flour, bags, lotions and cooking oil.  He employs one person to help him. He works from 7 am until 6 pm every day, except Saturday, and has four years experience.

Innocent has requested a loan from Kiva lenders to buy more items like bread, cassava flour, juice and water for sale. With the profit, Innocent will reinvest in his business and save for his future.

loans.use: To purchase more items such as cooking oil, cassava flour and bags for sale.

loans.name: Amer

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 50 years old, married and has six children.

In 1991 Amer opened a  wholesale food market selling grains and wheat. He has more than three years experience in this field and a good reputation and he is well known in his area.

He is requesting a $2500 loan to pay the annual rent for his market. He is optimistic about his business development and hopes that the coming years will continue to bring him positive growth.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his market.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy seeds (beans, sorghum, peanuts) for reselling

loans.name: Saida

texts.ru: Saida 58 let. Saida  jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoimi detmi.  Ona bila zamujem no yeyo muj brosil yeyo i 4 detey i uyexal ostaviv ix. Ona sama virostila svoix detey odna. Saida uje 10 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit ovec. Ona iz shersti ovec delayet razniye tepliye jeleti i prodayot ix. Seychas Saida nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit ovec dlya razvitiya svoyego biznessa i uvelicheniya kolichesta skota.
texts.en: Saida is 58 years old.  Saida lives in Baku with her children.  She was married, but her husband left her and their four children.  SHe raised the children alone.  Saida has been working as a shepherd for ten years, raising sheep.  She makes many different warm sheep's wool vests and sells them  Now she needs 2000 AZN to buy sheep to develop her business and enlarge her flock.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Mirali

texts.ru: Мирали проживает в районе Яван. Возраст, 36 лет. Женат. Имеет 10 детей. У них большая и дружная семья. Мирали занимается растениеводством. Он выращивает овощи для продажи. В этой области он работает уже 8 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения ядохимикатов, чтобы уничтожить вредных насекомых.
texts.en: Mirali lives in Yavan. He is 36 years old, married, and has ten children. They have a large and loving family. Mirali is a farmer.  He grows vegetables for sale. He has been doing this for eight years. He is taking out a loan to buy insecticide to destroy harmful insects.

loans.use: to buy insecticide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To cultivate a horticultural farm and to buy seeds

loans.name: Sanda

texts.fr:
Femme célibataire  âgée de 51ans, mère  d‘un enfant  âgé est comprise 26ans, elle a un niveau terminal e. en 2000,  par manque de soutient  elle avait préféré de  se lancer dans la vente des fruits de saisons avec un capital de 150.000frs. Ses recettes sont 15000F à 20.000F et elle vend au marché total qui est l’un des plus grands marché de la place.

Avec le prêt de HOPE, elle veut renforcer le stock de ses fruits tel que des pamplemousses, des mandarines, des citrons, des bigarades.

Pour le bien de sa famille, elle compte construire une maison. Très gentille, son souhait est de toujours satisfaire ses clients en leur offrant des meilleurs prix.
texts.en:
A single woman of 51, the mother of one child of 26, she completed the last year of high school. In 2000, since she lacked support, she decided to get into selling seasonal fruit with a working capital of 150,000 francs. Her receipts total 15,000 to 20,000 francs and she sells her goods in the Total market, one of the biggest local markets. 

With the loan from HOPE, she wants to expand her stock of fruit such as grapefruit, tangerines, lemons and bitter oranges. For the well-being of her family, she intends to build a house. 

Very pleasant, her wish is always to satisfy her customers by offering them the best prices.

loans.use: to buy grapefruits and tangerines.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy telephone use cards, Orange and Tigo, for resale.

loans.name: Senyi Tusitukirewamu Group

texts.en: Rose, 50, says anybody who believes can notch up something worthwhile in whatever they do. Rose believed she could be a business owner and she had the markings to have success at her grasp. This was 20 years ago. To get her food sales business on its feet, Rose had to play many trump cards. That belief in her own worth was, needless to say, already playing in her favor, but she needed to back it up with hard work, determination and building relationships with many people including potential money lenders. Once the stage was set, she took root and has never looked back. She sells foods such as bananas, cassava, maize, beans, rice, etc. in food markets in Lugazi. Rose also does farming as a side source of income. Weekly, her food sales business is worth 100,000 net profits. With this loan, she says she is going to purchase more foods such as maize, cassava, cabbage, rice, beans to resell.

loans.use: to purchase more foods such as cassava, maize, beans, etc to resell.

loans.name: Nemon

texts.ru: Немон живет в Вахдатском районе. Женат. Имеет семеро детей. У него Среднее Техническое образование. Четыре года как он занимается растениеводством. Кредит берет для увеличения и расширения видов растений.
texts.en: Nemon  lives in Vahdat.  He is married and has seven children.  He has a vocational education.  He has been farming for four years.  He is taking out a loan so that he can grow more and a greater variety of plants.

loans.use: grow more and a greater variety of plants.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 3 sacks of beans, 2 sacks of rice, a jerry can of gasoline, and a dozen rolls of toilet paper and to pay for labor

loans.name: Myassar

texts.en:
Myassar is a 30-year-old mother of 3 children, married to Jamal, an employee at the Ministry of Education. Myassar is also a hard-working mother who has a full-time job as a nurse in a clinic in their area.

Myassar has just started a small business by opening a small food store at home that she can work at after getting off her full-time job. Jamal also helps her in the store selling different kinds of spices, rice, canned vegetables, etc.

Since Myassar is just starting her business she applied for this loan to buy more food products so she will be able to serve most of the people in the area.

Myassar is from a conservative family, so she asked her husband Jamal to be in the picture.

loans.use: To add new types of food products for her food store.

loans.name: Yvette

texts.fr: Yvette  est client d’ACB depuis 2007. Elle est célibataire, elle a 29 ans, née au Rwanda. Elle 3 ans des études université, et ce crédit  est son premier cycle  de prêt avec ACB.  Elle va utiliser son prêt pour payer le minerval.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est de fournir tout effort nécessaire à ses études pour prépare son future.  Elle voudrait devenir un diplôme de niveau A0 en comptabilité et trouver un emploi un peu meilleur.
texts.en: Yvette has been client of ACB since 2007. She is unmarried and 29 years old. Born in Rwanda, she has three years of university education. This loan cycle is her first one with ACB. She is going to use her loan to pay for tuition. Her strategy for growth is to put in any effort necessary for studying, so as to prepare for her future. She would like to graduate in accounting at the A0 level and to find a somewhat better job.

loans.use: to cover tuition

loans.name: Amy

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme de 42 ans,mére de trois enfants(deux filles et un jeune garçon.)Les filles ont  arrété leurs études au collége et se sont lancées dans le mannequinat alors que le garçon est encore à l'école. L'emprunteuse est une brave mére de famille qui s'est toujours battu pour ses enfants.Ainsi, elle a travaillé dans une usine de traitement de poissons distante de sa localité de 10 km . Les longues heures de travaille(10h par jour) et la longue distance l'ont obligée à arréter le travail et à se lancer dans le commerce de chaussures et de produits de toilettes. Elle a réussi à acquerir aussi un taxi de transport urbain. Mais la prise en charge de la maladie de son pére, hospitalisé durant prés d'un an, a emporté toutes ses économies et l'a obligée à vendre le taxi. Elle a mis ainsi un terme à toutes ses activités pendant longtemps avant d'ouvrir un compte à l'IMCEC afin de les relancer.Elle sollicite aujourd'hui un pret de 100 000f pour s'approvisionner en produits en achetant notamment 2 douzaines de parfum, 03 douzaines de lait de corps, 01 douzaines de chaussures locales. Les bénéfices tirés de la vente de ces produits serviront à assurer la nourriture de la famille, à acheter des habits et des produits de beauté pour ses deux filles mannequines et à payer les frais de scolarité de son garçon. L'emprunteuse ambitionne dans le futur de créer une entreprise de commercialisation de produits vestimentaires et de produits cosmétiques dans sa localité.
texts.en:
This borrower is a 42-year-old woman and the mother of three children (two girls and a young boy). The girls have halted their studies in middle school and got started in modeling, while the boy is still in school. The borrower is a good, honest mother who has always struggled for her children. So, she has works in a fish-processing factory located 10 km from her town. The long work hours (ten hours a day) and the long distance compelled her to quit and start businesses involving shoes and personal care products. She has also succeeded in acquiring a taxi cab. 

But taking care of her ill father, who was hospitalized for almost a year, has drained all of her savings and has compelled her to sell the taxi. She therefore closed all her businesses for a long time and then opened an account at IMCEC in order to start up again. Today, she is requesting a loan of 100,000 francs to stock up on products, especially two dozen of perfume, three dozen of body lotion, and a dozen local shoes. 

The profits derived from the sale of these products will serve to ensure food for the family, clothing, and beauty products for her two daughters, who are models, and to cover the cost of schooling for her son. For the future, the borrower's ambitions include creating a company for marketing clothing and cosmetics in her town.

loans.use: to buy perfume, body lotion, and fabrics

loans.name: Erdenebaatar

texts.en:
Erdenebaatar and his wife started their cashmere-product manufacturing business in 2005. Besides their full-time jobs at different local companies, they manage to run their home-based business successfully.

They produce pure cashmere out of raw cashmere by themselves; hence the products are completely handmade and qualified. They make various products such as baby boots, slippers, hats, blouses and so on.

The business income is considerably high during the tourist season; therefore Erdenebaatar is requesting a 1,200,000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) loan to purchase raw materials in order to make more products before Naadam, the biggest Mongolian National Holiday, where large numbers of tourists come to see Mongolia.

He has a 1-year-old baby boy and a 4-year-old daughter. His family lives in a small apartment in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The couple wishes to expand their business and establish their own company in the future.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to produce more finished goods.

loans.name: Puca Puca Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Puca Puca, inicia su ciclo 6 con 13 socias las cuales tienen diversos negocios como la venta D.: cereales, ropa, anticuchos, comida, verduras, carne, leña y otras se dedican a la carpinteria.
Jesusa, es la Presidenta para el presente ciclo, tiene una carpintería, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra D.: madera, cola y clavos. 
Jesusa trabaja con la ayuda D. su hijo, fabrican mesas, sillas, puertas, ventanas, roperos, reposteros, pasamanos, etc. Está en FINCA Perú, desD. hace 4 ciclos, le agrada por la facilidad con que recibe los préstamos, se trabaja a base D. confianza, ingresó por la invitación D. su hermana con cierta duda, pero ahora está feliz, gracias a sus ahorros y semillita se pudo comprar un máquina sepilladora para su carpintería, ahora está ahorrando para comprarse otras máquinas.
texts.en:
The Puca Puca community bank has started their sixth loan with 13 members who have a variety of businesses including the sale of grain, clothing, kebab, food, vegetables, meat and firewood. Others make a living in carpentry. 

Jesusa is the president for the current loan and she has a carpentry workshop. She will invest the requested loan into the purchase of wood, glue and nails.

Jesusa works with the help of her son. They make tables, chairs, windows, wardrobes, pantries, banisters, etc. She has participated in FINCA Perú for the past four loans. She appreciates the ease with which she receives the loans, working with trust. She entered the group through an invitation from her sister, hesitantly at first, but now she is happy. Thanks to her savings and the loan she was able to buy a wood planning machine for her workshop. Now she is saving to purchase other machines.

loans.use: to buy wood, glue and nails.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy es socia del Banco Comunal Despertar, tiene 26 años, conviviente con un hijo de 4 años, se dedica a la venta de ropa en el mercado 12 de Abril, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería.
Nancy vende ropa sólo para caballeros y le va bien, le gusta por la facilidad en los préstamos, la capacitación que reciben y se puede ahorrar. Está ahorrando para la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Nancy is a member of the communal bank Despertar. She is 26 years old and lives with her son, who is 4. She sells clothing in the 12th of April market. She will invest the loan that she is applying for in the purchase of more merchandise.

Nancy sells only clothing for men, and it is going well. She likes (the communal bank) because of the ease of obtaining loans, the training that they receive, and because she can save. She is saving for the construction of her house.

loans.use: to buy clothing for men.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
Esther, es socia del Banco Comunal Despertar, tiene 29 años, es conviviente, con 2 hijos.
Se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropas para surtir su mercadería que lo compra en la ciudad de Lima.
Esther antes trabaja en una tienda de ahí aprendió el negocio, junto su capital y comenzó a trabajar independientemente, ahora tiene un puesto en le mercado 12 de abril y le va bien con sus ahorros incrementó su negocio. Ahora está ahorrando para la construcción de su casa. Su sueño es que su negocio siga prosperando, darle una buena educación a sus hijos y abrir una tienda.
texts.en:
Esther is a member of the communal bank Despertar. She is 29 years and lives with her partner and two children.

She sells clothing for women, men, and children. She will invest the loan that she is applying for in the purchase of clothing to stock her merchandise, which she buys in the city of Lima.

In the past, Esther worked in a shop and there she learned the business. She got her capital together and began to work independently. Now she has a stall in the 12th of April market, and it is going well. With her savings she has expanded her business. Now she is saving for the construction of her home. Her dream is that her business continues to prosper and that she can give a good education to her children and open a store.

loans.use: to buy various seasonal clothing

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es socia del Banco Comunal Despertar, tiene 28 años, es conviviente, y tiene dos hijos, tiene un puesto de abarrotes en el mercado de Santa Elena. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes en general como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, huevos harina, aceite, etc.
Ingreso a FINCA Perú, por la invitación de una socia, con éste es el segundo ciclo que está le parece bonito, se aprende mucho de las capacitaciones que reciben. Está ahorrando para comprarse un terreno. Su sueño es tener su negocio en su casa propia.
texts.en: Julia is a member of the communal bank Despertar. She is 28 years old and lives with her partner. She has 2 children. She has a grocery stall in the Santa Elena market. She will invest the loan that she is applying for in the purchase of groceries in general, such as rice, sugar, pasta, eggs, flour, oil, etc. She joined FINCA Peru at the invitation of a member. This is her second loan cycle. She likes the communal bank. She learns a lot from the training that they receive. She is saving to buy a plot of land. Her dream is to have her business in her own house.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, pasta, eggs, flour, and oil.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Mariela es socia del Banco Comunal Despertar, tiene 40 años, tiene 4 hijos, conviviente, tiene una cebicheria y restaurante, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de un horno para la preparación de pollos a la brasa.
Mariela y su esposo tiene una cebicheria – restaurante y también buffet para eventos especiales como: matrimonios, bautizos, cumpleaños, graduaciones, fiesta de promoción, etc. ahora piensan incursionar en la preparación de pollos a la brasa, por eso compraran su horno. Ingreso a FINCA Perú, por la invitación de una amiga,,loe gusta por los ahorros ya está casi 1 año y está ahorrando para comprarse un carro. Su sueño es poder tener un local propio.
texts.en:
Mariela is a member of the Communal Bank “Despertar” (To Wake Up). She is 40 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has four children. Mariela has a restaurant and “cevicheria” (an establishment that sell marinated seafood). The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of an oven for preparing rotisserie chickens.

Mariela and her husband manage the restaurant and “cevicheria”. They also prepare buffets for special events such as weddings, baptisms, birthdays, graduations, promotion parties, and other occasions. Now they plan to sell rotisserie chickens by purchasing this oven.

Mariela joined FINCA Peru after being invited by a friend. She enjoys being able to save. It has almost been a year and she has already saved for the purchase of a car. Her dream is to have her own location.

loans.use: to purchase an oven for preparing rotisserie chickens.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es: Soledad es socia del Banco Comunal Despertar, tiene 57 años, es casada con dos hijos, tiene un hospedaje en el cercado D. Ayacucho y dos puestos D. comida en el mercado D. Santa Elena. El préstamo que solicita lo destinará para el arreglo D. sus puestos que están descampados antes le habían asignado otros puestos pero los reubicaron D. nuevo, ahora D. nuevo tiene que comenzar a realizar algunos arreglos, le agrada FINCA Perú, por la facilidad en los créditos y el apoyo con las capacitaciones que reciben, está ya 4 años, se pasa momentos bonitos con las compañeras D. su banco es una manera D. relajarse, con sus ahorros fue implementando sus puestos, se compró su refrigeradora y algunas cosas que necesitaba. Su sueño es seguir prosperando.
texts.en: Soledad is a member of the communal bank Despertar. She is 57 years old and is married, with two children. She has a hostel in the Ayacucho district and two food stalls in the Santa Elena market. The loan that she is applying for is destined for setting up her stalls, which are out in the open. In the past, they assigned her other stalls, but they relocated them again, and now she has to begin arranging them again. She is pleased with FINCA Peru for the ease of obtaining loans and for the support and the training they receive. She has already been in the communal bank for 4 years, and she has a pleasant time with her fellow bank members. It is a way to relax. She set up her stalls with her savings. She bought a refrigerator and some things that she needed. Her dream is to continue prospering.

loans.use: to set up her food stalls.

loans.name: Eurocina Mercedes

texts.es:
Eurocina, es socia del Banco Comunal Despertar, tiene 57 años, es divorciada, con un hijo de 26 años, se dedica a la venta ropa, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de prendas de vestir para surtir su mercadería.
Eurocina tiene un puesto en el mercado 12 de Abril, antes se dedicaba a la venta de ropas interiores, pero cambio por la venta de ropas para recién nacidos y niños, está con éste negocio hace 12 años y le va bien, ingresó a FINCA Perú, por la invitación de una socia, le agrada por la capacitaciones que reciben, por los préstamos y se relajan, le enseñan y practican los valores. Su sueño es poder abrir otra tienda.
texts.en:
Eurocina is a member of the communal bank "Despertar".  She is 57, divorced and has a 26-year-old son.  She sells clothing for a living and is requesting a loan to buy more products to add to her inventory.

Eurocina has a stall at the 12 de Abril market.  She used to sell underwear but changed to clothing for newborns and children.  She has been in business for 12 years and it is going well for her.  She joined FINCA Perú through an invitation from another member, and is thankful for the training she has received as well as the loans.  She enjoys learning and practicing values.  Her dream is to open another store.

loans.use: To buy a variety of seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, es socia del Banco Comunal Despertar, tiene 40 años, es conviviente, con 5 hijos, tiene una tienda de abarrotes en general, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes para surtir su mercadería como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, harina, huevo, aceite, etc.
Elizabeth tiene una tienda de abarrotes en general en su casa comenzó de poquito, una amiga le habló e invitó a FINCA Perú, ya está hace 14 años, le agrada por la facilidad en los préstamos y se puede ahorrar. Con sus ahorros fue implementando poco a poco su negocio y se compró un terreno en la Selva de Ayacucho, la cual lo destinará para la siembra de cacao, ajonjolí.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a member of the Communal Bank “Despertar” (To Wake Up). She is 40 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has five children. Elizabeth manages a grocery store. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of groceries to restock her inventory such as rice, sugar, noodles, flour, eggs, oil, and other items.

Elizabeth’s store is located in her home and she started out with very little. A friend spoke with her about FINCA Peru and invited her to join. She has been a member for 14 years and is grateful the convenience of the loans and having the ability to save. With her savings, she was able to establish her business a little bit at a time and also purchase a plot of land in the jungle of Ayacucho. She plans to use it for planting cacao and sesame.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles, flour, eggs, oil, and other items.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina es socia del Banco Comunal Morenita Huamanga, tiene 32 años, es conviviente, tiene mototaxis y cabinas de Internet.
El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de módulos para sus computadoras. Está en FINCA Perú con éste el segundo ciclo, le gusta porque le entiende, tuvo algunas dificultades saco un préstamo para su suegra y no pago así que ella tuvo que asumir la deuda, pero se está recuperando. Está agradecida por la confianza y oportunidad que le da FINCA Perú. Su sueño es que su negocio se establezca y crezca.
texts.en:
Paulina is a member of the Communal Bank “Morenita Huamanga”. She is 32 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has a business of renting out motorcycle taxis and Internet booths.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in computer stations for housing her computer equipment. As a member of FINCA Peru, Paulina will be participating in her second loan cycle. She enjoys the understanding she has received since she experienced a few difficulties obtaining a loan for her mother-in-law. She was not able to repay, so Paulina was left with assuming her debt and is still recovering. She is grateful for the trust and the opportunity that FINCA Peru has given her. Her dream is to stabilize her business and see it grow.

loans.use: to purchase computer stations.

loans.name: Hilda Magali

texts.es:
Hilda, es socia del Banco Comunal Morenita Huamanga, tiene 38 años, es casada, tiene tres hijos, el negocio de Hilda es una tienda de abarrotes donde vende todo tipo de productos, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de: arroz, azúcar, fideos, harina, aceite, entre otros.
Hilda antes se dedicaba a la venta de jugos en forma ambulatoria pero decidió abrir una bodega a raíz de nacimiento de su bebe, está en FINCA Perú hace muchos años, le agrada por la facilidad en los préstamos sin tantos papeles poque se trabaja a base de confianza. Con sus  préstamos y ahorros fue implementando poco a poco su negocio donde vende ahora (abarrotes en general, verduras, frutas y gas) y otra parte lo utiliza para la educación de sus hijos, ahora le va bien gracias a Dios. Su sueño es que su negocio siga prosperando y comprarse un terreno para construir su casa propia.
texts.en:
Hilda is a member of the Communal Bank “Morenita Huamanga”. She is 38 years old, married, and has three children. Hilda has a grocery store where she sells all types of products. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of rice, sugar, noodles, flour, oil, and other items.

Hilda previously sold juices as a street vendor, but she decided to open a grocery store after the birth of her baby. She has been with FINCA Peru for many years and appreciates the convenience of the loans, which require little paperwork and are disbursed on the basis of trust. By utilizing her loans and savings, Hilda has gradually built up her business to the level she has now. She is able to sell groceries, vegetables, fruits, and gas. Hilda has also used part of her assets to provide for the education of her children, who are now doing well thanks to God. Her dreams include seeing her business continue to prosper and buying of piece of land so that she can build a house of her own.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles, flour, oil, and other items.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.pt:
Natural  de Vilanculos, povincia de Inhambane ao sul de Mocambique solteira e mãe de 5 filhos de idades entre 11 e 22 anos de idade. Fez a 4ª classe e parou por falta de condicoes financeiras. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta a cunhada e o neto que vivem com ela.
Saiu de Inhambane para Maputo com o marido que estava a cumprir o serviço militar obrigatorio, e negociante a mais de 10 anos e tem um rendimento de 7.000.00mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Nunca teve emprestimos noutros bancos. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de amigas que tambem sao clientes desta instituiçao e este e os seu quinto emprestimo no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos de venda (roupas, sapatos, e outros)os primeiros emprestimos foram de: 10.000.00mt,  12.000.00mt, 4.000.00mt, e 8.500.00mt.
texts.en:
Fatima is from Vilanculos in the province of Inhambane in southern Mozambique.  She is a single mother of 5 children who range in age from 11 to 22.  She finished through the fourth grade and stopped due to the lack of financial resources.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her sister-in-law and grandson who live with her.

She left Inhambane for Maputo with her husband who was fulfilling his mandatory military service. She has had her own business for more than 10 years, and she makes 7,000 meticals per month that she puts towards her home's expenses and also saves some in her bank account at the BIM bank.

She has never had a loan with another bank.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through friends that are also clients of the institution.  This is her fifth loan in the amount of 15,000 meticals, which she will use to buy products to sell (clothing, shoes, etc.).  Her previous loans were for:  10,000, 12,000, 4,000, and 8,500 meticals.

loans.use: to buy products to sell (clothing, shoes, etc.)

loans.name: Jackeline Del Pilar

texts.es:
Jackeline es socia del Banco Comunal Morenita Huamanga, tiene 29 años, es soltera, se dedica a la venta de regalos, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en surtir su mercadería.
Jackeline se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de regalos en la tienda de su mamá. Es estudiante de Ingeniería Química. Está en FINCA Perú hace tres años le gusta porque se inculca los valores, se práctica la solidaridad entre las socias. Su sueño es llegar a trabajar en una empresa en el área de Control de calidad.
texts.en:
Jackeline is a member of the Communal Bank “Morenita Huamanga”. She is 29 years old, single, and sells gifts. This loan she is requesting will be invested in more merchandise.

Jackeline sells all types of gifts at her mother’s store. She is a chemical engineering student. Jackeline has been with FINCA Peru for three years and likes the values that are promoted and the unity among its members. Her dream is to work for a company in the field of quality control.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Rumichaka Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Rumichaka, inicia su ciclo 9 con 16 socias, muchas D. ellas se dedican a la agricultura y siembran verduras, hortalizas y otros, pero se vieron afectadas por las constantes lluvias ocurridas en la zona durante los meses D. enero y febrero del presente año.
Nelly, es la Presidenta para el presente ciclo, tiene 24 años, es conviviente, tiene tres hijos D. 9, 5 y 3 años D. edad, se dedica a la siembra D. verduras y hortalizas.  El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra D. semillas para la siembra D. verduras.
Nelly siembra verduras en la Comunidad D. Rumichaka, queda a 25 minutos D. la cuidad D. Huamanga. Cuando sale su cosecha lo lleva y lo venD. por mayor en el mercado Nery García Zárate. Está en FINCA Perú, con éste el segundo ciclo ingreso por la invitación D. las socias. Le gusta por la facilidad D. los préstamos y con gran alegría vio que el terminar el ciclo ya tenia ahorrado un dinerito. Su sueño es recuperarse D. las lluvias que afectaron sus terrenos D. sembrío y que su negocio siga prosperando.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Rumichaka” is starting its ninth cycle with 16 members. They engage in agriculture, planting vegetables, and other activites. However, they were affected by the constant rains that occurred throughout the area during the months of January and February of this year.

Nelly is serving as President for this current loan cycle. She is 24 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has three children (ages 9, 5, and 3). Nelly grows vegetables and plants. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of vegetable seeds.

Nelly grows vegetables in the community of Rumichaka, which is 25 minutes away from the city of Huamanga. During the harvest season, she brings her produce to the Nery García Zarate Market to sell in bulk. She joined FINCA Peru after being invited by the other members and is now participating in her second loan cycle. She enjoys the convenience of the loans and the great joy that comes when finishing a loan cycle. Nelly already has a little bit of money saved. Her dream is to recover from the rains that impacted her farmland so that her business can continue to prosper.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable seeds.

loans.name: Mundo Magico Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Mundo Mágico inicia su ciclo 6 con 12 socias, las cuales tienen diversos negocios como la venta D. salchipollo, cebiche, abarrotes y otras socias son feriantes. La Presidenta para este ciclo es Leonor, tiene 44 años, es madre soltera y tiene tres hijos. Leonor tiene una bodega, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra D. arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche, harina, huevos para surtir su mercadería.
Leonor ingresó a Finca Perú, por la invitación D. una amiga, le agrada por la accesibilidad con que recibe los préstamos, y porque ahorran sin darse cuenta, tambien le gusta porque recibe charlas D. temas sobre la familia y el negoció. Está ahorrando para la titulación D. su hija.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Mundo Mágico” (Magic World) is starting its sixth loan cycle with 12 members. They engage in different business activities such as selling “salchipollo” (chicken and sausages), “ceviches” (marinated seafood cocktails), and groceries. Other members work as traders.

The President for this loan cycle is Leonor. She is 44 years old and a single mother with three children. Leonor owns a grocery store. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of rice, sugar, noodles, milk, flour, and eggs to restock her inventory.

Leonor joined FINCA Peru after being invited by a friend. She is grateful for having accessed the loans she has received and being able to save without much effort. Leonor also enjoys the seminars related to family and business. She is saving for her daughter’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles, milk, flour, and eggs.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Chibuto, povincia de Gaza ao sul de Mocambique solteira e mãe de 6 filhos de idades entre 8 a 25 anos de idade. Fez a 3ª classe e parou por falta de condicoes financeiras. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e não sustenta mais niguem.
Saiu de Gaza para Maputo com o marido que veio em missão  do serviço, e negociante a mais de 15 anos e é pensionista no ministerio das finanças tem um rendimento de 2.600.00mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Nunca teve emprestimos noutros bancos. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de amigas que tambem sao clientes desta instituiçao e este e o seu segundo emprestimo no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção (chapas, areia, pedra e outros)o primeiro emprestimo foi de: 10.000.00mt.
sonha em  concluir a sua casa,construir dependencias para aluguer e aplicar no seu negocio para propor melhor conforto a sua familia, e  para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Olivia was born in the district of Chibuto in the province of Gaza in southern Mozambique.  She is a single mother of 6 children who range in age from 8 to 25.  She studied through the third grade but stopped due to the lack of financial resources.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

She left Gaza for Maputo with her husband who came her on a mission with the military.  She has had her business for more than 15 years, and she manages pensions at the Ministry of Finance and makes 2,600 meticals per month, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account in the BIM bank.

She has never had a loan with other banks.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through friends that are also clients of the institution.  This is her second loan in the amount of 15,000 meticals, which she will use to buy construction materials (metal sheets, sand, stone, etc).  Her first loan was for 10,000 meticals

Her dream is to finish her home, to build units to rent out, and to invest in her business to provide better comfort to her family.  She plans to request more loans from Hluvuku to do this.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (metal sheets, sand, stone, etc.)

loans.name: Arminda

texts.pt:
Natural  de Maputo, povincia de Maputo ao sul de Mocambique solteira e mãe de 5 filhos dos  quais não lembra as respectivas idades. Fez a 9ª classe e parou por falta de condicoes financeiras,e agora retomou os estudos. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e não sustenta mais ninguem.
Nunca saiu de Maputo, e comerciante a mais de 19 anos e tem um rendimento de 3.500.00mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Nunca teve emprestimos noutros bancos. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de amigas que tambem sao clientes desta instituiçao e este e os seu terceiro emprestimo no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produto para o seu negocio como:roupas usadas, os primeiros emprestimos foram de: 5.000.00mt, e 10.000.00mt.
sonho e construir um estabelecimento comercial grande para ampliar o seu negocio e para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Arminda is from the city of Maputo in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  She is the single mother of 5 children, and she doesn't remember their respective ages.  She finished studying through the ninth grade and stopped due to the lack of financial resources.  Now she is starting her studies again.  She lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone besides them.

She never left Maputo.  She has had her business for more than 19 years and makes 3,500 meticals a month, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account at the BIM bank.

She has never had a loan with other banks.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through friends who are also clients of the institution.  This is her third loan in the amount of 15,000 meticals, which she will use to buy products for her business like used clothing.  Her previous loans were for 5,000 and 10,000 meticals.

Her dream is to build a large commercial location to expand her business for which she plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy products for her business like used clothing

loans.name: Isaura

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, povincia de Maputo ao sul de Mocambique solteira e mãe de 1 filho de 2 anos de idade. Concluiu a licenciatura. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e  sustenta os seus pais que vivem com ela.
Nunca saiu de Maputo, e funcionaria permanente na escola comunitaria casa d gaiato a mais de 13 anos e tem um rendimento de 21.198.10mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Fez emprestimo no BIM no valor de 90.000.00mt destinado a construção da sua casa. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de vizinhas que tambem sao clientes desta instituiçao e este e o seu primeiro emprestimo no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para concluir a sua obra (pedra, ferro, areia, e outros ).
sonho e conluir a sua casa, e mobiliar  e para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Isaura was born in the district of Boane in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  She is a single mother of one 2-year-old son.  She finished her bachelor's degree.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her parents who live with her.

She never left Maputo.  She has been a full-time employee in the community elementary school, "Casa de gaiato," for more than 13 years.  She makes a monthly income of 21,198.10 meticals, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account in the BIM bank.

She had a loan with BIM for 90,000 meticals, which she put towards building her home.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through neighbors that are also clients of the institution.  This is her first loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 15,000 meticals, which she will use to buy construction materials to finish her home (stone, iron, sand, etc.).

She dreams about finishing her home and furnishing it, for which she plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish her house (stone, iron, sand, etc.)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise (beer, refreshments, wine, and others) for his business

loans.name: Salvador

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, povincia de Maputo ao sul de Mocambique casado  e pai de 3 filhos de idades entre 6 a 17 anos idades. Fez a 4ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e  sustenta mais um sobrinho e um neto que vivem  com ele.
Nunca saiu de Maputo, e funcionario permanente a mais de 35 anos e tem um rendimento de 4.500.00mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Nunca fez emprestimo noutros bancos. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de palestras de agentes de bancos e este e o seu quinto emprestimo no valor de 12.500.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material para a sua obra (cimento, areia, tijolos,chapas e outros ), os primeiros emprestimos foram de: 9.600.00mt, 11.000.00mt, 13.000.00mt, e 12.200.00mt.

sonho e concluir a sua obra, mobiliar e comprar um carro e para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Salvador was born in the district of Boane in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  He is married and the father of 3 children who range in age from 6 to 17.  He studied through the fourth grade and didn't continue due to the lack of financial resources.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports one of his nephews and a grandson who live with him.

He never left Maputo.  He has had a full-time job for more than 35 years and makes 4,500 meticals a month, which he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account at the BIM bank.

He has never had a loan with another bank.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through talks given by the bank's representatives.  This is his fifth loan in the amount of 12,500 meticals, which he will use to buy materials to finish his house (cement, sand, bricks, metal sheets, etc.).  His previous loans were for:  9,600, 11,000, 13,000, and 12,200 meticals.

He dreams about finishing his home, furnishing it, and buying a car, for which he plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy materials to finish his home (cement, sand, bricks, metals sheets, etc.)

loans.name: Rui

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, povincia de Maputo ao sul de Mocambique casado  e pai de 4 filhos de idades entre 8 a 18 anos idades. Fez a 7ª classe e parou quando conseguiu emprego. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e  sustenta mais um sobrinho e um neto que vivem  com ele.
Nunca saiu de Maputo, e funcionario permanente a mais de 2 anos e tem um rendimento de 5.000.00mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Fez emprestimo na SOCREMO destinado a construçã da sua casa. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de amigos e este e o seu quinto emprestimo no valor de 10.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material para a sua obra (cimento, areia, blocos,chapas, ferro e outros ), os emprestimos anteriores foram de: 8.300.00mt, 5.000.00mt, 10.000.00mt, 10.000.00mt.
sonho e concluir a sua obra, mobiliar para propor mais conforto para a sua familia e para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Rui was born in the city of Maputo in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  He is married and the father of 4 children who range in age from 8 to 18 years.  He studied through the seventh grade and stopped when he got a job.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports a nephew and a grandson who live with him.

He never left Maputo.  He has had a full-time job for more than 2 years and makes 5,000 meticals per month that he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account at the BIM bank.

He had a previous loan with SOCREMO that he used to build his home.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through friends.  This is his fifth loan in the amount of 10,000 meticals, which he will use to buy materials to finish his home (cement, sand, bricks, metals sheets, iron, etc.).  His previous loans were for: 8,300, 5,000, 10,000, and 10,000 meticals.

His dream is to finish his house and to furnish it to provide his family with more comfort.  He plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku to do this.

loans.use: to buy materials to finish his home (cement, sand, bricks, metal sheets, iron, etc.)

loans.name: Sergio

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, povincia de Maputo ao sul de Mocambique casado  e pai de 2 filhos de idades entre 7 e 10 anos idades. Fez a 7ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e não sustenta mais ninguem.
Nunca saiu de Maputo, e funcionario permanente no comite olimpico a mais de 3 anos e tem um rendimento de 3.000.00mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Fez emprestimo no banco C.C.O no valor de 20.000.00mt para a construção da sua casa. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de amigos que tambem sao clientes  este e o seu primeiro emprestimo no valor de 9.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material para a sua obra (cimento, areia, blocos,chapas, ferro e outros ).
sonho e concluir a sua obra, mobiliar para propor mais conforto para a sua familia e iniciar um negocio, para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Sergio was born in the district of Boane in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  He is married and the father of 2 children who are 7 and 10.  He studied through the seventh grade and stopped due to the lack of financial resources.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone besides them.

He never left Maputo.  He has been a full-time employee with the olympic committee for more than 3 years.  He makes 3,000 meticals per month that he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account at the BIM bank.

He had a previous loan with the CCO bank for 20,000 meticals that he put towards building his home.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through friends that are also clients of the institution.  This is his first loan with Hluvuku, and he will use it to buy materials to finish his home (cement, sand, bricks, metal sheets, iron, etc.).

His dream is to finish his house and to furnish it to provide his family with more comfort.  He also wants to start a business.  He plans to request more loans from Hluvuku to do this.

loans.use: to buy materials to finish his home (cement, sand, bricks, metal sheets, iron, etc.)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise (beer, oleo, soft drinks, wine, etc.)

loans.name: Luisa

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, povincia de Maputo ao sul de Mocambique viuva e mãe de 4 filhos de idades entre 13 a 29 anos de idade. Fez a 3ª classe e parou por falta de condicoes fina ceiras. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta os netos que tambem vivem com ela.
Nunca saiu de Maputo, e comerciante permanente a mais de 20 anos e tem um rendimento de 4.000.00mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Nunca fez emprestimo noutros bancos. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de amigos que tambem sao clientes e este e o seu segundo emprestimo no valor de 10.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, blocos, areia , e outros ).
sonho e concluir a sua obra,e construir um estabelecimento comercial na sua residencia, e para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Luisa was born in the city of Maputo in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  She is a widow and the mother of 4 children who range in age from 13 to 29.  She studied through the third grade and stopped due to the lack of financial resources.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her grandchildren who live with her.

She never left Maputo.  She has had a business for more than 20 years.  She makes 4,000 meticals a month, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account at the BIM bank.

She has never had a loan with another bank.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through friends who are also clients of the institution.  This is her second loan in the amount of 10,000 meticals, which she will use to buy construction materials (cement, iron, bricks, sand, etc.).

Her dream is to finish her home and to build a commercial establishment in her home, for which she plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, iron, bricks, sand, etc.)

loans.name: Elie

texts.fr: Elie  est client d’ACB depuis 2009. Il est marié, il est  âgé de 40 ans. Il a  5 enfants entre 2 ans et 12 ans. Il a 3 enfants, vont à l’école .Il est né au  Rwanda.son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de secondaire(A2). C’est son deuxième  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser le prêt pour acheter du ciment, brique, tôles et payer la main d’œuvre. Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire  est utiliser des matériels moderne pour sa maison et avoir une annexe qu’il peut faire loué. Dans l’avenir il voudrait devenir un grand homme d’affaire et construire d’autre maisons destine à la location  pour sa famille il voudrait éduquer ses enfants au moins au niveau de l’université, et prépare un meilleur avenir  pour sa famille
texts.en:
Elie has been a client of ACB since 2009. He is married and 40 years old. He has five children, aged 2 to 12 years. He has three children going to school. Elie was born in Rwanda and has a sixth grade education (A2). This loan cycle is his second one with ACB. He is going to use the loan to buy some cement, bricks, and sheet metal and to cover the cost of labor. His strategy for business growth is to use modern supplies and equipment for his house and to have an annex he can rent out. 

For the future, Elie would like to become a major businessman and to build more houses for renting out. As for his family, he would like to educate his children at the university level or higher and to make a better future for his family.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, and sheet metal and to cover the cost of labor

loans.name: Felismina

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Marracuene, povincia de Maputo ao sul de Mocambique casada e mãe de 7 filhos dos quais nao lembra as respectivas idades so que todos sao maiores de idade. Não estudou. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta os netos que tambem vivem com ela.
Nunca saiu de Marracuene, e comerciante permanente a mais de 22 anos e tem um rendimento de 24.000.00mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Nunca fez emprestimo noutros bancos. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de uma amiga que tambem e cliente e este e o seu primeiro emprestimo no valor de 10.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção (pedra, cimento, ferro, blocos, areia , e outros ).
sonho e concluir a sua obra,e mobiliar para propor mais conforto a sua familia, para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Felismina was born in the district of Marracuene in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  She is married and the mother of 7 children whose respective ages she she doesn't remember, only that they're all adults.  She did not go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her grandchildren that live with her.

She never left Marracuene.  She has had a business for more than 22 years.  She makes 24,000 meticals a month, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account at the BIM bank.

She has never had a loan with another bank.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is her first loan in the amount of 10,000 meticals, which she will use to buy construction materials (stone, cement, iron, bricks, sand, etc.).

Her dream is to finish her home and to furnish it to provide more comfort to her family.  She plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku to do this.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (stone, cement, iron, bricks, sand, etc.)

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 35 años que vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 3 y 8 años  en el municipio de soledad, donde se dedica a la venta de vísceras principalmente y al transporte interno del municipio, como es usual en esta población mediante  una bicicoche. 
Desde muy joven trabajó con un filmador de ganado y tomó todo su aprendizaje de este oficio para finalmente dedicarse de manera independiente y específica a vender en las calles vísceras, cuando sufrió una lesión de cadera quedó sin empleo y con su liquidación invirtió en esta actividad, que la complementa con el transporte local en la misma bicicleta en el otro tiempo que antes le quedaba libre.  Su sueño más adelante es tener su propia casa y un local donde instalarse, con todas las herramientas y equipos para desde allí distribuir entre vendedores y amas de casa los productos derivados de la carne. En su negocio tiene una rotación rápida de inventarios y sus utilidades se reflejan en un corto tiempo manejando una rentabilidad no menor a un 25%.
Gradualmente quiere disponer de un mayor capital de trabajo, porque abordará zonas aledañas a su área de acción en las que aún no ha incursionado, ya que su dinero no le alcanza para comprar en mayor cantidad y de contado. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará en mayor cuantía vísceras y hará mantenimiento a la bicicoche donde hace repartos y transporta personas a las que quiere trasladar en una forma segura y sin contratiempos.
texts.en:
Jorge is a man of 35 who lives with his spouse and his two children, aged 3 and 8, in the municipality of Soledad. His work is mainly selling organ meats, and he also provides transportation within the municipality, using a bicycle cart as is typical among the inhabitants of this area. 

Since he was very young, he worked with a livestock butcher, from whom he learned all about the profession. He eventually decided to work independently, specifically selling organ meats on the street. When he suffered a hip injury, he was without work for a while, and with the payoff he invested in this business, which he complements with local transportation, using the same bicycle, during what used to be his free time. His dream for the future is to have his own house and a store where he can set up his business, with all of the necessary tools and equipment, so that he can distribute meat-related products to vendors and housewives. His business has a rapid turnover of inventory, and his profits reflect this in the short term, with a consistent profitability level of no less than 25%.

He would like to gradually accumulate more working capital, because there are zones neighboring the area where he works which he has not yet entered, since his funds have not been sufficient to buy merchandise in larger quantity and pay cash. His Kiva loan is his first financing experience with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, and he will use it to buy organ meats in larger quantities and to carry out maintenance on his bicycle cart, which he uses to make deliveries and to transport people who want to go from place to place safely and without delays.

loans.use: to buy organ meats in greater quantity and carry out maintenance on his bicycle cart.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade da Matola, povincia de Maputo ao sul de Mocambique separada e mãe de 2 filhos de idades entre 9 e 16 anos de idade. Fez a 5ªclasse e parou quando engravidou. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e não sustenta mais ninguem.
Nunca saiu de Maputo, e comerciante permanente a mais de 9 anos e tem um rendimento de 1.800.00mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Nunca fez emprestimo noutros bancos. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de uma prima que tambem e cliente e este e o seu primeiro emprestimo no valor de 8.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos de venda (açucar,oleo, arroz, e outros ).
sonho e construir um estabelecimento comercial,para ampliar o seu negocio e para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Ana was born in the city of Matola in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  She is separated and the mother of 2 children, who are 9 and 16.  She studied through the fifth grade and stopped because she became pregnant.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone besides them.

She never left Maputo.  She has had a business for more than 9 years.  She makes 1,800 meticals per month, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account at the BIM bank.

She has never had a loan with another bank.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through her cousin who is also a client of the institution.  This is her first loan in the amount of 8,000 meticals, which she will use to buy products to sell (sugar, oleo, rice, etc.).

Her dream is to build a commerical establishment to expand her business, for which she plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy products to sell (sugar, oleo, rice, etc.)

loans.name: Sebastiao

texts.pt:
Nasceu na povincia de Gaza ao sul de Mocambique casado e pai de 3 filhos de idades entre 15 e 19 anos de idade. Fez a 4ªclasse e parou por falta de condições financeiras. vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta os seus pais enviando dinheiro para ajudar nas despesas alimentares.
Saiu de Gaza para Maputo a procura de emprego,e carpinteiro a mais de 20 anos e tem um rendimento de 7.000.00mt por mes que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancaria (BIM).
Fez um emprestimo no BCI para compra de material da carpintaria. Conheceu Hluvuku atravez de um amigo que tambem e cliente e este e o seu primeiro emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 9.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material para a sua obra (ferro, tabua, prancha,cimento, e outros ).
Sonha em e ampliar a sua obra e a sua carpintaria, e para ampliar o seu negocio e para tal tenciona solicitar mais emprestimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Sebastiao was born in the province of Gazo in southern Mozambique.  He is married and the father of 3 children who range in age from 15 to 19.  He studied through the fourth grade and stopped due to the lack of financial resources.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his parents by sending them money to help with their food costs.

He left Gaza for Maputo in search of employment.  He has been a carpenter for more than 20 years and makes 7,000 a month which he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account in the BIM bank.

He had a previous loan with BCI to buy carpentry materials.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is his first loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 9,000 meticals, which he will use to buy materials to finish his home (iron, boards, cement, etc.).

His dream is to expand his home and his carpenter's shop to expand his business, for which he plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy materials to finish his home (iron, boards, cement, etc.)

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margret has been in the tailoring business for the last 10 years. She is a hardworking 42-year-old business woman. She is married and blessed with three children. She is grateful to Faulu Kenya for supporting her finances to inject into her business. In the next five years, she wants to be a well-known tailor in her local community.

She wants a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy fabric, threads and canvas for her business.

loans.use: to buy dress materials, threads and canvas.

loans.name: Jeisson Alberto

texts.es: Jeisson de 18 años vive en el barrio Nuevo Milenio del municipio de Soledad y es el propietario de un negocio llamado “Mr. Ciber” , actividad  que inició inspirado por su espíritu emprendedor y el firme deseo de apoyar a su madre en los gastos del hogar. Jeisson es un joven que muestra una claridad en sus metas y siempre tiene un norte para lograr un buen desempeño en su vida personal, familiar y de negocios; él tiene el sueño de conocer a los Estados unidos,  conocer por si mismo equipos modernos y hacer crecer su negocio, hasta convertirlo en un elegante café internet  ubicado en un centro comercial, donde exista un gran dinamismo de clientes. Su máximo desafío es el poco capital de trabajo y las limitaciones del espacio locativo con lo que hasta ahora cuenta para llevar a cabo sus sueños. En la actualidad planea adicionar un televisor un computador y artículos de papelería para diversificar y darle a su negocio un matiz de estudio e investigación a su negocio, porque sus principales clientes son jóvenes que allí hacen sus tareas o se divierten sanamente apoyados por Jeison. Esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, el primer financiamiento que hace a ala Fundación Santo Domingo, porque con sus nuevos equipos y la venta de mercancía relacionada con el objetivo de su negocio, logrará llamar la atención de nuevos clientes y sostener satisfechos a los que tiene. Mientras trabaja por alcanzar sus sueños, se esfuerza en su negocio por hacerlo crecer y aumentar su margen de utilidad que es no menor el 33%.
texts.en:
Jeisson, 18, lives in the Nuevo Milenio neighborhood in the town of Soledad.  He owns a business called "Mr. Ciber" which he set up because of his entrepreneurial spirit and his firm desire to help his mother cover household expenses.  Jeisson is a young man with clear goals and a desire to get ahead in his personal, family and business life.  He dreams of one day visiting the United States and seeing modern equipment, and of growing his business and turning it into an elegant Internet café in a shopping center with many customers.

For now he is planning to add a television set, computer and stationery items to diversify his business and give it an atmosphere of study and research.  His main customers are young people who visit him to do their homework or enjoy a leisurely, healthy pastime supported by Jeisson.  This is why he is reaching out to credikiva, his first loan through the Santo Domingo Foundation.  The new equipment and related merchandise will attract new customers and satisfy current ones.  While working to try and meet his goal, he is taking every effort to expand and increase his profit margin, which is no less than 33%.

loans.use: To buy a television set, computer and stationery items.

loans.name: Jose Adrian

texts.es:
Jose Adrian tiene su negocio que es una pulpería y venta de mariscos. Tiene más de 17 años, en este negocio a sus clientes les gusta hablar con Jose Adrian ya que es una persona que brinda muy buenos consejos y esto atrae a la mayoría de sus clientes. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes, granos básicos, entre otros. El tiene el sueño de invertir cada día más en su negocio ya que así podrá tener más clientes.

Efectivamente la foto esta con lentes porque el tiene un problema en su ojo y permanentemente anda con lentes y el dijo al momento que se le tomo la foto que si se aceptaba asi con mucho gusto pero que sin lentes el no se la tomaba.
texts.en:
Jose Adrian has a grocery store and sells seafood.  He has been in business for over 17 years and his customers enjoy talking to Jose because he gives very good advice and attracts many customers.

He is requesting a loan to buy sweets, softdrinks, bread, detergents, basic grains, and other items.  His dream is to invest more and more in his business so he can reach more customers.

loans.use: To buy sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergents, basic grains, etc.

loans.name: Sabha

texts.en:
Sabha is a 37-year-old mother with four children; she is married to Samer who sells fruit and vegetables.

Sabha has always wanted to have her own business and her own source of income, so she opened a small grocery store almost two years ago, that has been running very successfully in the neighborhood.

Now Sabha is applying for a loan to buy more food products as a preparation for the Holy Month of Ramadan.

loans.use: To add new kinds of food products to her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy clothing, creams, bags, and shoes.

loans.name: Elly

texts.en:
Elly has been running a human resource consultancy firm for the last 21 years. He supplements this income from earnings of his rental houses. He is a patient, hardworking and time-conscious 46-year-old businessman. He is married and blessed with two children, ages 15 and 8.

In the next five years, he wants to have expanded his business and to employ several employees to handle the expanding clientele. His dream is to own a college that teaches business management and human resources. He wants 95,000 Kenyan shillings to buy stationery and for advertising his business.

loans.use: to buy stationery and for advertising his business.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
En su tienda Alfredo vende ranchos, víveres, abarrotes, carnes, bebidas frías, al detalle a sus principales clientes, que son, sus vecinos y especialmente las amas de casa ubicadas en el barrio Moderno donde se encuentra su negocio. La experiencia de Alfredo data desde hace 36 años, tiempo desde el cual ha logrado convertirla en  una tienda de gran tamaño; allí  trabaja con su hijo de 19 años, quien estudia por las noches una carrera técnica en el Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje, organismo apoyado por el estado. La tienda abre sus puertas desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m. de lunes  a Domingo, razón por la cual  la comunidad identifica este horario intenso como su gran fortaleza, porque cuentan con este negocio cuando lo requieran y esto es justamente lo que garantiza su éxito, así como también los precios justos que allí se ofrecen, acompañada de la vocación de servicio que tiene todos los integrantes de la familia C.. Su meta mas adelante es lograr convertir su tienda en un granero importante en el sector, para desde allí distribuir a pequeños negocios y con ello les resolvería su necesidad de ahorro en el transporte. Mientras Alfredo trabaja por alcanzar sus sueños, se esfuerza mucho en su negocio, logrando una liquidez de 4 veces y una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor del 13%. 
Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará productos desechables  y víveres en mayor volumen, porque su rotación es muy rápida debido a que la ubicación de este negocio es favorable, porque se encuentra en una vía transitable de peatones y hay un despliegue comercial a su alrededor que potencializan su venta rápida.
texts.en:
In his grocery store, Alfredo sells canned goods, groceries, meat, cold beverages, and other retail items to his main customers who are his neighbors, especially the homemakers who live in the Moderno neighborhood where his store is located.  Alfredo has 36 years' experience and has been able to make his store a large one.  He works with his 19-year-old son who is studying at night for a technical degree through the National Learning Service which is state supported.  The store opens from 5:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m., Monday through Sunday.  The community recognizes these opening hours as a sign of greath strength because they can count on the store when they need to, which is what guarantees its success.  The prices are also low and all the members of the C. family show their true vocation for the business.

His goal for the future is to turn his store into an important sector establishment, being able to distribute to small businesses and saving on transportation.  While Alfredo works to reach his goals, he makes every effort in his business and is achieving a significant cash-flow and profit on sales of 13%.  His credikiva is his first loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation.  He plans to use it to buy bulk disposable products and groceries, due to the quick turnaround because of his location where there are many passersby and surrounding shops.

loans.use: To buy bulk disposable products and groceries.

loans.name: Rachelle

texts.fr:
Cliente de 26 ans, mariée avec 3 enfants a sa charge, ayant considéré ses charges familiales,pour aider a subvenir aux besoins de sa famille, elle se lance dans la petite pâtisserie et elle fait ses brioches tous les deux jours , les ventes sont de 20.000 a 45.000 frs par jour.

A l'octroi de son prêt elle va acheter deux sacs de farine, 50kg de boite de margarine ,50kg de lait, sachets de sel fine des sachets pour l'emballage, elle pense aussi compléter 10 nouveaux moules en aluminium pour accroitre le stock de ses brioches, vu que la demande est très forte et le nombre des clients ne fait que s'accroitre.
Elle épargne beaucoup parce qu'a l'avenir elle pense ouvrir un salon de the et épargner plus d'argent parce qu'elle pense envoyer ses enfants dans une école de pâtisserie pour créer a la longue une entreprise familiale et pouvoir multiplier les coins de livraison
texts.en: This is a 26-year-old client who is married. She has three children to support. Having considered her family expenses, she started a small pastry shop to support her family. She makes brioches every two day. Sales range from 20,000 to 45,000 francs a day. Once her loan is granted, she is going to buy 2 sacks of flour, a 50-kg container of margarine, 50 kg of milk, some pouches of fine salt, and some bags for packaging purposes. She is also thinking of rounding out ten new aluminum molds in order to increase her inventory of brioches, given that the demand is great, and the number of customers only climbs. She is saving a lot of money because she is thinking of opening a tea shop in the future and saving more money. This is because she is thinking of sending her children to a pastry school, so as to establish a family enterprise over time and to increase the number of delivery outlets.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of of flour, 5 trays of eggs, some fine salt, a 50-kg sack of sugar, and some plastic bags for packaging purposes

loans.name: Magdaleno De Jesus

texts.es: Magdaleno De Jesús tiene 55 años, su actividad es la venta y elaboración de artesanía. Hace más de 12 años que tiene este medio de vida, es un hombre  persona muy emprendedora y disfruta de hablar con sus clientes. Es por eso que solicita este crédito con el fin de invertir en la compra de barro, pinturas, acuarelas entre otros. Su objetivo es invertir en su actividad para poder generar ganancias a su hogar que son muy necesarias.
texts.en: Magdaleno De Jesús is 55 years old and he prepares and sells handicrafts. He has been engaging in this activity for more than 12 years, he is a very resourceful man and he enjoys talking to his customers. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy potter’s clay, dyes and watercolors among other products. His goal is to invest in his activity in order to earn the money he needs to provide for his family.

loans.use: To  buy potter’s clay, dyes and watercolors.

loans.name: Nubia

texts.es: Nubia tiene 60 años, su actividad es ofrecer el servicio de costura desde hace mas de 43 años que tiene de administrar el negocio, pues desde muy joven en su familia le han enseñado a luchar y a trabajar muy duro para poder mantener a su familia. Uno de sus mayores desafíos es el tiempo ya que tiene ciertos encargos que le solicitan y le brindan muy poco tiempo en la entrega, pero aun así sabe cómo trabajar bajo presión.
